## OWebDataStore.set() method

Sets key/value pair in the store.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(key: string, value: OJSONValue): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | The data key name. |
|  value | OJSONValue | The data value. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
